text: Creativity is contagious. Pass it on
author: Albert Einstein

text: If you don't strive for anything, you won't get anything
author: Zig Ziglar

text: A sense of humor is the only divine quality of a person
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

text: Intelligence is the ability to quickly adapt to change
author: Stephen Hawking

text: If you're working on something that turns you on, you don't need a hit. The mission guides you
author: Steve Jobs

text: Without changing direction, you stay in the same place
author: Lao Tzu
